Easy Array Modifier

Interactive array modifier with real-time preview.

Controls:

  • A: Add array modifier

  • X/Y/Z: Change array axis

  • F: Flip start/end

  • +/-: Adjust count

  • Mouse: Real-time offset adjustment

Quick setup for linear, circular, and custom array patterns.
